modelName: WP Battery monitor Smart Shunt Pro
name: Battery Monitor 2

modelInfo.name: WP Battery monitor Smart Shunt Pro

description.en: WP-BMSS Pro is a professional grade battery monitor with remote monitoring capability.

name.en: General Device States

description.en: These states reflect the operational status of the device

name.en: Battery charging state

description.en: Indicaties if the battery is being charged or discharged

name.en: Generator request

description.en: Indicaties which generator request is active

name.en: Device warnings

description.en: These states reflect the warnings active on the device

name.en: Device alarms

description.en: These states reflect the alarms active on the device

name.en: Digital output 1 state

description.en: Reflects the state of digital output 1

name.en: Digital output 2 state

description.en: Reflects the state of digital output 2

name.en: DC Battery Voltage

description.en: Amount of volts for DC Battery

name.en: Battery current

description.en: Amount of amps going in our out of the battery

name.en: Battery SOC

description.en: Battery state of charge in percentage

name.en: Time remaining

description.en: Time remaining until battery is empty

name.en: Battery capacity drawn

description.en: Amount of Ah drawn from battery

name.en: Peukert capacity remaining

description.en: Amount of peukert corrected Ah remaining in battery

name.en: Battery Temperature Sensor

description.en: Battery temperature reflected in celcius (-127 C to 128 C)

name.en: Reset battery SOC

description.en: Resets the battery state of charge to 100%

name.en: Reset warning and alarms

description.en: Resets all active warning and alarms

name.en: WhisperConnect transmit period

description.en: The rate at which monitoring messages are send

name.en: WhisperConnect additional messages enabled

description.en: Enables additional monitoring messages

name.en: WhisperConnect nick name

description.en: The nick name used in WhisperConnect communication

name.en: WhisperConnect ID

description.en: The WhisperConnect ID used in communication

name.en: Nominal shunt voltage

description.en: Nominal shunt voltage rating

name.en: Nominal shunt current

description.en: Nominal shunt current rating

name.en: Nominal battery capacity

description.en: Nominal battery capacity of battery to be monitored

name.en: Battery C rating

description.en: Battery C rating at which the capacity is specified

name.en: Battery peukert coefficient

description.en: Battery peukert coefficient rating

name.en: Charge efficiency factor

description.en: Charging efficiency factor of the system specified in percentage

name.en: Auto synchronize voltage

description.en: The battery voltage level at wich the battery monitor will synchronize

name.en: Auto synchronize current

description.en: The charge current level at wich the battery monitor will synchronize

name.en: Auto synchronize time

description.en: The time after wich the battery monitor will synchronize

name.en: Time remaining averaging period

description.en: The period length for which an average is calculated for the time remaining

name.en: Time remaining discharge floor

description.en: The battery SOC at which the battery is considered empty for the time remaining

name.en: Digital output 1 processing

description.en: Reflects how all signals are processed into digital output 1

name.en: Digital output 2 processing

description.en: Reflects how all signals are processed into digital output 2

name.en: Digital output 1 mode

description.en: Reflects the behaviour of digital output 1

name.en: Digital output 2 mode

description.en: Reflects the behaviour of digital output 2

name.en: Voltage calibration offset

description.en: Calibration offset for the battery voltage measurement

name.en: Voltage calibration multiplier

description.en: Calibration multiplier for the battery voltage measurement

name.en: Current calibration offset

description.en: Calibration offset for the battery current measurement

name.en: Current calibration multiplier

description.en: Calibration multiplier for the battery current measurement

name.en: Charge current measurement deadband

description.en: Deadband to ignore charge current measurements

name.en: Discharge current measurement deadband

description.en: Deadband to ignore discharge current measurements

name.en: Maximum charge current for ROM led bar

description.en: Maximum charge current corresponding to a full ROM led bar

name.en: Maximum discharge current for ROM led bar

description.en: Maximum discharge current corresponding to a full ROM led bar

name.en: Low voltage alarm enabled

description.en: Enables the low voltage alarm

name.en: Digital outputs used

description.en: Digital outputs used for low voltage alarm

name.en: Low voltage alarm trigger on value

description.en: Value at which the low voltage alarm triggers on

name.en: Low voltage alarm trigger off value

description.en: Value at which the low voltage alarm triggers off

name.en: Low voltage alarm trigger on delay

description.en: The delay at which the trigger must be met

name.en: Low voltage alarm trigger off delay

description.en: The delay at which the trigger must be met

name.en: Low voltage alarm minimum on time

description.en: The time the alarm must be on before it can turn off

name.en: Low voltage alarm maximum on time

description.en: The maximum time the alarm can be on before it is forced off

description.en: Enables the high voltage alarm
